title: Love Island's India Reynolds 'waits for bae' Ovie Soko in racy post five weeks after last sighting
text:
Love Island star India Reynolds has set pulses racing with her latest racy Instagram post as she flaunted her jaw-dropping figure in skimpy lingerie.

The reality star, 28, looked incredible in a skimpy black bra and matching suspenders as she shared the snap from her latest lingerie shoot that was captioned 'waiting for bae.'

The post sparked a slew of comments from fans questioned whether the 'bae' was her boyfriend Ovie Soko, as it has been over a month since the couple were last seen together.

Sexy: Love Island star India Reynolds has set pulses racing as she pined after her boyfriend Ovie Soko in a racy lingerie snap

Wow! The reality star posted a playful caption that hinted she was waiting for her beau Ovie, after donning the lingerie for a photo shoot

In the snap, India ensured that every inch of her amazing figure could be seen, as she put on a sexy display in a revealing black bar and matching suspenders.

She captioned the post: 'Waiting for bae to get home like...' which appeared to be a reference to her boyfriend Ovie.

The post was quickly flooded with comments from fans demanding to know whether the 'bae' in questions was still Ovie. The couple have not been seen together since August.

What's going on? The post comes five weeks after India and Ovie were last spotted together, though there has been no indication that they have split (pictured above on 9th September)

One fan posted: 'Does she go out with Ovie still?' while another added: 'Are you and Ovie still together?'

A third wrote: 'Is Ovie still your bae?' while one fan also posted: 'Praying it's Ovie.'

A fan also asked: 'Are u still with over?'

Questions: Fans seemed to pick up on Ovie's recent absence and flooded the comments section with questions about whether they are still together

Ovie and India were last spotted together leaving the TV Choice Awards on 9th September, but neither have given any indication that they have split.

The couple finished third on Love Island in July, after striking up a romance just weeks before the series came to an end.

Last month Ovie was forced to hit back at claims that India had cheated on him with footballer Kieran Gibbs, 29, at his birthday party in Ibiza.

Still going strong: Last month Ovie was forced to hit back at claims that India had cheated on him with footballer Kieran Gibbs at his birthday party in Ibiza (pictured in August)

In an exclusive interview with MailOnline the basketball player said: 'Me and India are happy. I think that's definitely the most important thing. We're very happy.

'Regardless of how many people [there are] in every one of our lives, there will be opinions. And everyone can have their own opinion.'

The following India week also hit back at the cheating claims, telling MailOnline: 'We've had a week of nightmare things. There was one [rumour] last week and then yesterday there was another. Can we have a break? Can we just live, please?

'We've been absolutely fine, but obviously it's not nice. The worst thing is – something coming out in the paper is one thing, we know it's not true and we can just get over that – but it's all the people on Instagram that start sending you horrible messages.'

Clarifying the situation, she explained: ‘I’ve known Kieran and his brother for years and it was their 30th birthday so I was there with loads of friends and family. There’s nothing about it! It got blown into a ridiculous thing.’
description: The star, 28, looked incredible in a black bra and matching suspenders for the racy snap. Fans were quick to ask whether her 'bae' was Ovie Soko, as the couple haven't seen together since last month.
